author: forthommel
body:
This PR introduces a large refactoring of the offline reconstruction code for PPS (diamond detectors, horiz. pots) and TOTEM (UFSD, vert. pots) timing detectors.
* timing calibration parameters for the latter and its SAMPIC acquisition chain,
* new data format for TOTEM timing detectors: local track container,
* pre-existing (CT)PPS local track for diamond detectors now superseded through the use of a parent object (`CTPPSTimingLocalTrack`) shared with the former (hence, bumped the class version accordingly),
* tracking code is also amended to allow multiple input/output methods to be used, thus allowing a shared implementation of a same tracking logic for these two friend objects,
* update of the `totemTimingLocalReconstruction` sequence.

This update in the reconstruction chain should be transparent for the CMS side, and a new era might be necessary to enable it for the reco of high-beta* dedicated runs (e.g. run 314816 might be used for testing purposes, PhEDEx request triggered to retrieve it on `T2_CH_CERN`).
title: Timing calibrations and tracking for PPS/TOTEM timing detectors
